author: remm
msg: - Modify a bit latest patch, since here the flush should be in its own try/catch.

author: remm
msg: - Make code more robust. Fixes a tester failure.

author: craigmcc
msg: Enhance logging of session creation and destroy events, to ensure that the
right events are called when you invalidate an old session, and create a
new one, within the same servlet request.  No functional change.

author: kinman
msg: - Use UTF-8 encoding for XML view of a JSP page.
